item.title: Im creating new client and i need help on background
item.dc:creator: @tedyslilnoob tedyslilnoob
item.description:
@tedyslilnoob wrote:

First, put the image you want into the client folder, and call it say, bgimage.jpg

then go into Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1

search:

Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getImage

next to that you should see something liek:

("hybrid.jpg");

(or a different name)

just change the name to bgimage.jpeg

Read full topic
